itinerary.mapNote: Lost City visit: 1,200 stone steps, 169 terraces. 1100m.

waypoints.name: Ciudad Perdida
waypoints.note: Lost City (Teyuna). 650 AD. Older than Machu Picchu by 650 years.

waypoints.name: 1,200 Stone Steps
waypoints.note: Slippery steep approach. Reveals 169 circular terraces at top.

waypoints.name: Buritaca River
waypoints.note: Jungle river crossings on approach. Multiple wade-throughs.

waypoints.name: Mamey Trailhead
waypoints.note: Start/end village. Local Kogi and Wiwa indigenous communities nearby.
